XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/get_languages" Method="GET" Call="getLanguages"/> <Route Url="/get_words/:lang" Method="GET" Call="getWords"/> </Routes>

Method.name: getLanguages
Method.Implementation: set obj = "{""languages"":[" set lang="" for { set lang = $order(^CacheMsg("SAMPLEUI",lang)) quit:lang="" set obj = obj_""""_lang_"""," } set obj = obj_"]" w $piece(obj,",]",1)_"]}" quit $$$OK

Method.name: getWords
Method.Implementation:
set obj = "[" set id = "" for { set id = $order(^CacheMsg("SAMPLEUI",lang,id)) quit:id="" set word = ^CacheMsg("SAMPLEUI",lang,id) set obj = obj_"{""id"":"""_id_""", ""word"":"""_word_"""}," }
set obj = obj_"]" w $piece(obj, ",]", 1)_"]" quit $$$OK
